response.overview: This eye-opening documentary explores the colorful and surprisingly creative craft of quilt making as practiced in traditional Amish and Mennonite communities across America. Travel to a quilt museum in Pennsylvania, observe a quilt being stitched in Ohio and attend a quilt auction in Wisconsin, with more stops in Kansas, Iowa and other Amish and Mennonite settlements in between.
response.title: Amish & Mennonite Quilts Across America
